name: Gunwheels
description:
A submission for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020. with the theme Out of Control. The image of flying backwards from recoil was very funny to me so I decided to use it. Fly over the stages trying to keep your gun's recoil in control. 

The theme out of control made me think of something that at first seems cumbersome and uncontrollable but with practice can be honed to your advantage. out of control... for now.

Try getting the fastest times and commenting them!

sadly I lost all the development files mid development due to an unfortunate deletion. So this dev built is all that's left and didn't get to add a menu, remove some dev text and polish it some more with more levels.
